title: Foreign Language Education Intercultural Competency Development Course for Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on enhancing intercultural communication skills for corporate-affiliated pre-service and in-service elementary teachers when explaining mathematical concepts in a foreign language

learning_goals: Learners can analyze intercultural conflict cases in math classes and propose three or more solutions using cultural metacognitive strategies
Learners can design communication strategies considering cultural differences when explaining math concepts in a foreign language and apply them to actual class scenarios
Learners can write metacognitive reflection journals to address uncertainty in intercultural interactions and establish improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
